purpose: To provide infrastructure for securely running AI code interpreters in isolated environments.
principle: Utilizes Firecracker microVMs and Nomad for orchestrating isolated execution environments, leveraging Go for infrastructure management.
reusability: Offers a modular infrastructure setup with Terraform scripts, supports integration with GCP and other cloud providers.
limitations: Primarily designed for cloud environments; may require significant configuration for on-premise deployments.
name: infra
description: Infrastructure for AI code interpreting that's powering E2B.
highlight: Enables secure and isolated execution environments for AI code interpretation using microVMs.
